rules.text: Discrimination of any kind is prohibited – this includes but is not limited to racism, xenophobia, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, etc.
Content that you do not have permission to post is prohibited.
Spam and / or bots are prohibited.
Media showing anything that someone may find objectionable must be marked as sensitive. This is especially true for anything that should only be viewed by people over 18.
Any political, polarizing topics or other stress-inducing conversations should be put behind a content warning (CW).
Under 18s are not permitted to sign up to this instance.
Media showing nudity, bodily fluids or messy diapers must be behind a Content Warning (CW)
Artwork, photos, images or descriptions (e.g., role-playing) of any kind depicting or describing anyone under 18 in any adult situation is STRICTLY not permitted.
